title: Unpopular opinions ITT
body:
people need to stfu about undertale

tamat is to blame for a lot of boards gd's problems

mage mains are likeable people

hatedaddy's ban was deserved and wanting him unbanned is wanting moderation to be fair only when it's convenient for you rather than it being consistent

furi kuri is the smartest person posting on gd right now and was too smart for kite's gd to handle, which is why he's banned from there

chickenwrap is a decent person

the anti-gameplay and balance circlejerk threads are dumb and give that board more attention than it deserves

keyru has the hardest job of any rioter that interacts with us on a semi-consistent basis
